alert.note: Alert for Central Oahu; Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Koolau Leeward; Koolau Windward; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Waianae Mountains (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 16 at 4:56PM HST until January 17 at 12:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH MIDNIGHT HST FOR INTERIOR AND WINDWARD KAUAI AND OAHU... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR THE HIGHEST SUMMITS OF THE BIG ISLAND AND MOUNT HALEAKALA ON MAUI... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR NIIHAU MOLOKAI LANAI REMAINING PORTIONS OF OAHU AND KAUAI AND FOR THE LOWER ELEVATIONS OF MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND... .Strong southwest winds will continue through this evening with gusts up to 60 mph possible on portions of Kauai and Oahu as a cold front approaches the area from the west. Strong southwest winds on the summits of the Big Island and Haleakala Summit will continue through Wednesday. ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT HST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 30 mph with localized gusts to 60 mph. * WHERE...Interior and windward Kauai and Oahu. * WHEN...Until midnight HST tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines and damage roofs. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Strong winds may lead to property damage. Hazardous driving conditions due to powerful cross winds will pose a serious risk for drivers, especially for light weight and high profile vehicles. Loose outdoor items should be brought inside or secured properly.
